member.name: T:Openize.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples
member.summary: Provides C# code examples for creating, reading, and modifying Presentation images using the Openize.Slides library.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Prepares the directory 'Presentations/Image' for storing or loading PowerPoint(PPT or PPTX) presentations at the root of the project. If the directory doesn't exist, it is created. If it already exists, existing files are deleted, and the directory is cleaned up. Prepares the directory 'Presentations/Existing/Images' to store images to be added to the presentations.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples.AddImageInASlide(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method adds up an image in a slide

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples.UpdateImageInExistingSlide(System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: This method updates the existing image of a slide

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples.RemoveImageInExistingSlide(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method removes the image from presentation

member.name: T:Openize.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples
member.summary: Provides C# code examples for creating, reading, and modifying slides in a Presentation using the Openize.Slides library.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Prepares the directory 'Presentations/New' for storing or loading PowerPoint(PPT or PPTX) presentations at the root of the project. If the directory doesn't exist, it is created. If it already exists, existing files are deleted, and the directory is cleaned up.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples.CreateNewSlideInNewPresentation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method create slides in a new presentation

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples.CreateNewSlideInExistingPresentation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method creates new slide in an existing presentation

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples.RemoveSlideInAnExistingPresentation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method removes slide in an existing presentation

If the directory doesn't exist, it is created. If it already exists, existing files are deleted, and the directory is cleaned up.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.StyledListExamples.CreateBulletedListInASlide(System.String,System.String)

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.StyledListExamples.AddListItemsInAnExistingList(System.String,System.String)

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.StyledListExamples.RemoveListItemsInAnExistingList(System.String,System.String)

member.name: T:Openize.Slides.Examples.TableExamples
member.summary: Provides examples for creating tables in PowerPoint presentations.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.TableExamples.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Prepares the directory 'Presentations/New' for storing or loading PowerPoint(PPT or PPTX) presentations at the root of the project. If the directory doesn't exist, it is created. If it already exists, existing files are deleted, and the directory is cleaned up.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.TableExamples.CreateSimpleTableInASlide(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a simple table in a slide of a PowerPoint presentation.
member.param: The directory where the PowerPoint presentation is located. Default is 'Presentations/Existing'.
The name of the PowerPoint file. Default is 'test.pptx'.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.TableExamples.CreateTableWithTableStylingsInASlide(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a table with stylings applied in a slide of a PowerPoint presentation.
member.param: The directory where the PowerPoint presentation is located. Default is 'Presentations/Existing'.
The name of the PowerPoint file. Default is 'test.pptx'.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.TableExamples.CreateTableWithRowStylingsInASlide(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a table with stylings applied to rows in a slide of a PowerPoint presentation.
member.param: The directory where the PowerPoint presentation is located. Default is 'Presentations/Existing'.
The name of the PowerPoint file. Default is 'test.pptx'.

member.name: M:Openize.Slides.Examples.TableExamples.CreateTableWithCellStylingsInASlide(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a table with stylings applied to cells in a slide of a PowerPoint presentation.
member.param: The directory where the PowerPoint presentation is located. Default is 'Presentations/Existing'.
The name of the PowerPoint file. Default is 'test.pptx'.
